content:
1. Runners with Easter baskets cross the finish line.
2. Red Cross volunteers distribute Easter eggs to runners.
3. A race course lined with Easter eggs.
4. Runners collect eggs for charity.
5. Easter eggs and hydration for runners.
6. Runners receive eggs at a water station.
7. Easter-themed medals for race finishers.
8. Egg hunt during charity run.
9. Red Cross aids runners with Easter treats.
10. Runners and eggs raise funds.
